q_text: How many dose levels are being tested?
What is the target toxicity level for this trial?
What is the maximum sample size for this trial?
What is the starting dose level?
What size will the cohorts be?
How confident are you about which doses might be toxic?
params: choices=Very confident (good historical data),Somewhat confident,Not confident/limited data

q_text: How much time/budget is available for trial design set up?
params: choices=Not limited by budget or time, There is some flexibility in budget/time,Trial design is limited by budget/time

q_text: Will you have access to a statistician experienced with dose-finding designs?
params: choices=Yes experienced with complex modeling,Yes but prefer simpler approaches,Limited statistical support

q_text: How important is it to have pre-specified transparent decision rules?
params: choices=Very important (regulatory/reproducibility),Flexible adaptation preferred,Simple fixed rules fine
